title: Librarian By Day
description: Shy, reserved librarian Jennifer Davidson has a secret side that few people know about. She writes erotic spanking romances. She’s never been spanked herself, but when her boyfriend stumbles across one of her books, all that changes.Nik Evans has always hoped there was a bad girl hiding underneath his prim, proper librarian, but even he is surprised when they begin to explore her fantasies and he finds out just how naughty she can be.Soon, Jennifer is embarking on a sensual journey of discovery in which she learns that having her bottom warmed for real is better than anything she’s ever written about in her books.  Torrid Romance Contemporary  Erotic Romance - Explicit (Contains adult content, language, and graphic sex)
author: Paige Tyler
